definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Two extra carriages were joined on at Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 在南京站加掛了兩節車廂。

sentences.english: The train will be ready to leave when all the carriages have been coupled.
sentences.chinese: 在所有車廂都連接好時列車即可開出。

sentences.english: In the spirit of gender-equality, a male-only carriage must be introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本着男女平等的精神，必須設立男士專用車廂。

sentences.english: Quickly take a picture with DC then hurry back to the warm cart.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙用數碼相機拍了張照片就鑽回了溫暖的車廂裏。

sentences.english: We had two Pullman cars and a 70-foot baggage car.
sentences.chinese: 我們有兩個臥鋪車廂和一輛70英尺長的行李車。

sentences.english: This carriage has a seating capacity of 120 people.
All inner scenes are shot inside this car.
sentences.chinese: 所有內部鏡頭均在此車廂內被拍攝。

sentences.english: Passengers were thrown from their seats against walls, doors, each other.
sentences.chinese: 車廂內乘客被甩到車廂牆壁上，門上，互相亂撞。

sentences.english: Passengers were thrown from their seats against walls, doors, each other.
sentences.chinese: 車廂內乘客被甩到車廂牆壁上，門上，互相亂撞。

sentences.english: This fellow is traveling in a first-class compartment on a second-class ticket.
sentences.chinese: 這個傢伙竟然拿着二等車廂的票坐一等車廂。

sentences.english: This fellow is traveling in a first-class compartment on a second-class ticket.
sentences.chinese: 這個傢伙竟然拿着二等車廂的票坐一等車廂。

sentences.english: A train usually has a long passage in it.
sentences.chinese: 火車車廂裏通常有一條長長的通道。

sentences.english: I'll be sitting in the third carriage from the engine.
sentences.chinese: 我將坐在機車後面的第三節車廂內。

sentences.english: A carriage door struck him as a train drew into Basildon station.
sentences.chinese: 當火車駛進巴斯爾登站時，一節車廂的門撞到他了。
您要非吸菸車廂的票嗎？

sentences.english: Paiko threw himself into the back of the Land Rover, banging his head against the hard metal.
sentences.chinese: 派克將自己扔到陸虎後車廂裏，頭倚着硬硬的鐵皮。

definition: car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
to get on or into (a bus, train, car etc)
car window/window of vehicle (bus, train etc)
